name: KWC Defence
description:
Crappy one I made in exactly one hour for Weekly Hour Game Jam (W27 2017).

Use mouse to rotate turrets, and W, A, S, D to shoot red blips from each turret. There are only 8 citizens left in the city and if you let Zed use their brains as nutela, then the game is over. There is no way to win as Zed keep spawning indefinitely.
